name: Orbital Free
description:
FREE DIGITAL CRACK!

ORBITAL has been designed and developed exclusively for the iPhone and is probably the game with the highest addiction potential. Brilliant graphics and simple 1-thumb-controls guarantee intensive game moments at any time - of which you just can’t get enough. Convince yourself of the simplicity and beauty of the bitforge hit game and check out the free version now.

You don’t believe it? Read what the critics say:
«The App Store description calls Orbital 'highly addictive'. What an understatement! Orbital should come with a warning: 'May cause sleeplessness and increased Facebook updates'. I had serious one-more-game syndrome for about three days.» 9/10
- Barbara Holbrook (appcraver.com)

«BitForge has managed to combine the addictive gameplay of 'Peggle' and the beauty of 'Geometry Wars', two digital forms of crack, into one easy to use package.»
- Chad George (thatvideogameblog.com)

«An astonishing Physics Puzzler. Orbital is a 5-Dimple gotta-have-it game that has earned a permanent place on our iPhone.»
- appsmile.com

«The beauty of Orbital is really in its simplicity of play. And despite its simplicity, it’s incredibly addictive and very challenging. I find myself continually saying 'just one more time…'» 9/10
- theiphoneappreview.com

«The game provides a solid challenge and is highly addicting.» 5/5
- iphoneincanada.ca

«This is one game that you will want to play again and again…and then again. [...] Come to think of it, there are really no negative points about the game. Good going, Bitforge!» 5/5
- iphonefootprint.com

«Orbital is a rare gem on the iPhone. [...] By the time we got the hang of it, we were hooked.» 3/4
- slidetoplay.com

«ORBITAL is a unique and challenging game of strategy that will keep you coming back for more.»
- appchatter.com
